trans-unit.source: What's next?
trans-unit.target: What's next?

trans-unit.source: Now that you've created your first app, check out the rest of the Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: Now that you've created your first app, check out the rest of the Dev Center.

trans-unit.source: Here's an introduction to the different sections it contains.'
trans-unit.target: Here's an introduction to the different sections it contains.'

trans-unit.source: What's next?
trans-unit.target: What's next?

trans-unit.source: Now that you've created your first app, check out the rest of the Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: Now that you've created your first app, check out the rest of the Dev Center.

trans-unit.source: Here's an introduction to the different sections it contains.
trans-unit.target: Here's an introduction to the different sections it contains.

trans-unit.source: Design Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps
trans-unit.target: Design Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps

trans-unit.source: Make your app stand out by learning how to design a great user interface.
trans-unit.target: Make your app stand out by learning how to design a great user interface.

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section provide guidelines for app design, considerations for planning, case studies, graphical resources, and design templates.
trans-unit.target: The topics in this section provide guidelines for app design, considerations for planning, case studies, graphical resources, and design templates.

trans-unit.source: Go to [Design](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=533896).
trans-unit.target: Go to [Design](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=533896).

trans-unit.source: Develop apps
trans-unit.target: Develop apps

trans-unit.source: The Develop section provides detailed info and coding examples for the many of the features available to your app.
trans-unit.target: The Develop section provides detailed info and coding examples for the many of the features available to your app.

trans-unit.source: Go to [Develop](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=529575)
trans-unit.target: Go to [Develop](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=529575)

trans-unit.source: Selling apps
trans-unit.target: Selling apps

trans-unit.source: The Windows Store lets you reach the millions of customers who use Microsoft Windows.
trans-unit.target: The Windows Store lets you reach the millions of customers who use Microsoft Windows.

trans-unit.source: The Windows Store is a marketplace where you sell apps to customers practically anywhere in the world.
trans-unit.target: The Windows Store is a marketplace where you sell apps to customers practically anywhere in the world.

trans-unit.source: Customers find apps relevant to their country or region in a consistent way across all devices.
trans-unit.target: Customers find apps relevant to their country or region in a consistent way across all devices.

trans-unit.source: You choose to sell your apps in specific countries or regions, and you can specify a single price tier that prices your app in local currencies.
trans-unit.target: You choose to sell your apps in specific countries or regions, and you can specify a single price tier that prices your app in local currencies.

trans-unit.source: Go to [Publish](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=268275).
trans-unit.target: Go to [Publish](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=268275).

trans-unit.source: API reference
trans-unit.target: API reference

trans-unit.source: This section contains detailed info on the classes, properties, methods, events, styles, and other APIs that you can use to create Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.
trans-unit.target: This section contains detailed info on the classes, properties, methods, events, styles, and other APIs that you can use to create Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.

trans-unit.source: Go to [API reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/br211369.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Go to [API reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/br211369.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Language reference
trans-unit.target: Language reference

trans-unit.source: This section describes the programming languages available to you and any variations in the Universal Windows Platform (UWP) implementation of those languages.
trans-unit.target: This section describes the programming languages available to you and any variations in the Universal Windows Platform (UWP) implementation of those languages.

trans-unit.source: If you need help understanding and coding with the languages, this section will help you.
trans-unit.target: If you need help understanding and coding with the languages, this section will help you.

trans-unit.source: Go to [Language reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=534184).
trans-unit.target: Go to [Language reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=534184).

trans-unit.source: Develop games
trans-unit.target: Develop games

trans-unit.source: If you're interested in developing games using DirectX, this section provides the info you need.
trans-unit.target: If you're interested in developing games using DirectX, this section provides the info you need.

trans-unit.source: Go to [Develop games](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=534184).
trans-unit.target: Go to [Develop games](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=534184).

trans-unit.source: Develop Internet of Things (IoT) apps
trans-unit.target: Develop Internet of Things (IoT) apps

trans-unit.source: If you're interested in developing for the Internet of Things (IoT), this section provides the info you need.
trans-unit.target: If you're interested in developing for the Internet of Things (IoT), this section provides the info you need.

trans-unit.source: Go to [Develop IoT apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=534186).
trans-unit.target: Go to [Develop IoT apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=534186).
